name: Squire for Hire
description:
Your day has finally come – a famous hero has enlisted YOU to be their Squire! When your hero completes quests, defeats baddies, and takes all the credit, they also earn loot – which you get the great honor of carrying! Collect items and organize your bag efficiently to get hired!

In the official Squire for Hire: Digital app:

• Play as all four squires from the original Squire for Hire 18-card game. (includes a hidden unlockable character!)
• Unlock Mystic Runes - the first standalone expansion included for free!
• Strategic tile-laying game for 1-4 players! (Includes Pass-and-Play Multiplayer only)
• Multiple game modes including Squire Stacking (extra scoring conditions) and combined decks!
• Introducing single player quests for the first time!
• Complete Achievements and show those heroes you have what it takes to be their squire!
• The app counts all of your item tiles AND points for you!
